delhi.name: Delhi
delhi.subtitle: Discover the Heart of India with Our Reliable Taxi Services
services: Our **Airport Transfers** from Indira Gandhi International Airport offer timely and professional services. [Book your airport transfer](https://example.com/airport-transfers-delhi) for a comfortable experience.

For **Local Rides around Delhi**, we provide a variety of vehicles suited for all types of trips, from short errands to full-day rentals. [Learn more](https://example.com/local-rides-delhi) about local options.

Plan an **Outstation Trip** from Delhi to explore nearby destinations like Agra, Jaipur, and Manesar. [Explore destinations](https://example.com/outstation-trips-delhi) for a day trip or a weekend getaway.
Our **Corporate Services** cater to business travelers with executive cars, priority support, and billing options. [Corporate inquiries](https://example.com/corporate-services-delhi).
Long-term **Rental Services** are available for projects, extended stays, or visiting professionals. [Rental options](https://example.com/rentals-delhi) suit various durations.
Discover Delhi’s heritage with our **Sightseeing Tours** to Red Fort, Qutub Minar, and India Gate. [Tour packages](https://example.com/tours-delhi) are customizable.
Our **Intercity Cab Services** link Delhi to nearby cities such as Noida, Gurgaon, and Faridabad. [Book an intercity ride](https://example.com/intercity-cabs-delhi) for smooth travel.
history: Delhi has a rich history dating back to the Mahabharata, once known as **Indraprastha**. [History of Delhi](https://example.com/delhi-history) offers a glimpse into its past.
The city is home to several UNESCO World Heritage Sites, including **Qutub Minar**, **Red Fort**, and **Humayun's Tomb**. [UNESCO Sites](https://example.com/unesco-sites-delhi) are major attractions.
Today, Delhi is the bustling capital of India, combining ancient monuments with modern architecture. [Delhi’s growth](https://example.com/economic-growth-delhi).
culture: Delhi’s cultural diversity is celebrated through festivals like **Diwali, Holi, and Eid**, which are marked by vibrant events. [Delhi Festivals](https://example.com/delhi-festivals).
The city’s food culture is famous for dishes like chole bhature, parathas, and kebabs. [Food in Delhi](https://example.com/food-delhi) is a treat for visitors.
Delhi’s art and theater scene is lively, with venues like **Kamani Auditorium** and **NSD** hosting various performances. [Delhi Art Scene](https://example.com/art-scene-delhi).
thingsToDo: Visit the iconic **Red Fort** and learn about Delhi’s history. [Plan a visit](https://example.com/red-fort).
Explore **India Gate**, a war memorial, and a popular spot for evening outings. [More about India Gate](https://example.com/india-gate).
The **Lotus Temple** is a stunning piece of architecture and a peaceful place for meditation. [Lotus Temple details](https://example.com/lotus-temple).
Experience Delhi’s markets, from **Chandni Chowk** to **Sarojini Nagar**, offering everything from traditional goods to fashion. [Explore Delhi Markets](https://example.com/delhi-markets).
Walk through **Lodi Gardens**, a beautiful park with historical tombs and lush greenery. [Visit Lodi Gardens](https://example.com/lodi-gardens).
popularRoutes: Delhi to Agra - Home to the Taj Mahal and a popular day trip from Delhi. [Book a ride](https://example.com/agra).
Delhi to Jaipur - Explore the Pink City, famous for its forts and palaces. [Book a ride](https://example.com/jaipur).
Delhi to Chandigarh - Visit the modern city designed by Le Corbusier. [Book a ride](https://example.com/chandigarh).
Delhi to Rishikesh - A spiritual city on the Ganges, ideal for adventure and peace. [Book a ride](https://example.com/rishikesh).
Delhi to Manesar - A quick escape to a serene town with luxury resorts. [Book a ride](https://example.com/manesar).
